revised_title: Neuronal Integration in the Anuran Auditory Pathway: Single Unit Responses in the Torus Semicircularis of the Cane Toad
tldr: This study investigates the responses of single units in the torus semicircularis of the cane toad, Bufo marinus, to understand the characteristics of neuronal integration in the lower auditory pathway. The results suggest that there may be at least two functionally distinct pathways in the lower auditory system of the toad, with some neurons having response properties consistent with complex integration of the afferent input.
